image.alt: A photograph of my head looking up into a blue sky weaering a hat.

text: this is as transient as you want it to be. i can edit, reorder, delete. nice that git keeps the history...

right now a stream node has two properties, `text` and `time` but really, you could have anything. formalizing a universal pattern isn't necessary. right now, i don't need much more than this. maybe an `image` object with `url` and `alt` attributes...
@social.jake.fun#1650928030807 maybe this is a way to reply/thread?
the only really annoying thing about my current setup (github & netlify) is 1. using git to update json and 2. manually generating timestamps. other than that, it's really a dream.
there is something kinda nice about the lack of formality to this. people who don't do it right / do it annoyingly will just never be followed.
lol this is a social network
